name: The Sims 4: Cats & Dogs
storyline:
Use the powerful Create A Pet tool to customize your Sims’ perfect cats, dogs, puppies and kittens.

Experience the companionship and fun that furry friends bring to your Sims’ lives.

Build a veterinary clinic, hire a dedicated staff and further your career as the town’s most promising animal doctor.

Creating a new furry friend is just the beginning. You can open your own veterinary clinic, discover Brindleton Bay and more!

From simple collars to cute costumes, you can give your cat or dog the perfect look for any occasion.

Build a strong relationship with your new furry friend when your Sims care for, train and play games with their pets.

Take your dog to the park, stroll along the harbor docks and watch out for stray pets that your Sims can adopt.
summary: Create a variety of cats and dogs, add them to your Sims' homes to forever change their lives, and care for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian with The Sims 4: Cats & Dogs. The powerful new Create A Pet tool lets you personalize cats and dogs, each with their own unique appearances, distinct behaviors, and for the first time, expressive outfits! These wonderful, lifelong companions will change your Sims' lives in new and special ways. Treat animal ailments as a veterinarian and run your own clinic in a beautiful coastal world where there's so much for your Sims and their pets to discover.
